statements.sql:
select * from `system_files` where (`system_files`.`attachment_type` = 'RainLab\Blog\Models\Post' and `system_files`.`attachment_id` = '3' and `field` = 'featured_images' and `system_files`.`attachment_id` is not null or exists (select 1 from `deferred_bindings` where slave_id = system_files.id and `master_field` = 'featured_images' and `master_type` = 'RainLab\Blog\Models\Post' and `session_key` = 'FlWESHIXFX8TeT8fDxev1wSnIIYUQxzx30TU0Uy1' and `is_bind` = '1')) and not exists (select 1 from `deferred_bindings` where slave_id = system_files.id and `master_field` = 'featured_images' and `master_type` = 'RainLab\Blog\Models\Post' and `session_key` = 'FlWESHIXFX8TeT8fDxev1wSnIIYUQxzx30TU0Uy1' and `is_bind` = '0' and id > ifnull((select max(id) from deferred_bindings where
slave_id = system_files.id and
master_field = 'featured_images' and
master_type = 'RainLab\Blog\Models\Post' and
session_key = 'FlWESHIXFX8TeT8fDxev1wSnIIYUQxzx30TU0Uy1' and
is_bind = '1'
), 0)) order by `sort_order` asc
